documents.document: Just confirmed my appointment with staff for a mani-pedi...Friday, 11am. Or 11:30am if I oversleep. Or 12noon. Maybe 12:30pm. #handsomeboy
Celebrating my 2nd anniversary with staff, who I must say have finally come around to my way of thinking. I sample all their meals too!
@CuriousZelda Persil? Sending you non-static nose bumps for your birthday:)
@CuriousZelda there's no wireless coverage in the laundry basket :(
@CuriousZelda I've been off line for one day and you decide to celebrate a birthday without me? You look fabulous as ever, ma truffe!
Mum's birthday is over...I can go back to being my usual self! #badkitty #whosabadboy
@CuriousZelda Those eyes that beguile Those whiskers so true I think I might be falling For irresistible you!
@sjayyr if you insist...but it will encourage her expectations later on!
@maggieAb30 give her lots of hugs an paw taps!
Happy #AustraliaDay to all & happy birfday to me Mum 4 tomorrow, which will be the 26th here in Canada! #goodcat #willbehave #onehugonly
It's arrived and Mum is inspired! @InspireHealthBC @nedbell @gustotv @sjayyr So glad we participated...for my dad aâ€¦ https://t.co/KsCxPfCBU1
@evilbmcats hang on a mo'...I have to brush my fangs before I go marauding...vet says I have to brush twice a day.
@maggieAb30 me mum's B-Day too...wonder what they'd like? #deadmouse #birdfeathers #headbutt #wetnosekiss ??
Apricot Glazed Salmon with Pomegranate Salsa https://t.co/smPtAXc99O via @gustotv Did someone tweet salmon?
#CatsOfTwitter anyone game to start a GoFundMe for @StevieEvilCat 's travel expenses? ðŸ˜¼ https://t.co/BL06yIM1ue
Hoping this is an incentive to the staff here. #areyoulistening #followhisexample https://t.co/YFgPEUg6sB
Staff will be put on half rations if the decs aren't down today...even @NigelSlater has finally put his away!â€¦ https://t.co/teK01jifDk
Half hour later...still no sign but I'm ready in case he needs me. https://t.co/quFC0cb1EE
Homecare nurse came today to change Dad's dressings...they wouldn't let me watch! Had to stand guard outside bedrooâ€¦ https://t.co/nNTCfezNvf
Time to switch... https://t.co/VuCm3qQTA2
Other paw sunning... https://t.co/RDXa9vqmFy
Must take advantage of the sun... https://t.co/RS05Bwqxtk
@MiloCarrotCat @ronithebrat @livingroomlions @KhanCats @RoxyRoxLA my second anniversary is coming up Jan 31! Must have been a Milo year!
@sjayyr oooooh, are you flirting with me?!! #winkwinksaynomore
Can someone move me a little to the left, please? https://t.co/y6aiZH4nQR
@cox_tom my dad wants to know where he can get a pair of pants like what you're wearing? #superfly #tomcoxisthedude
Very disappointed with the service in this restaurant. #notip #complaintothemanager https://t.co/zTzkYomRWY
3rd snowstorm in less than 2 weeks. I blame Dad, he always wants a white Christmas! Anyway, Jan 1 we all sleep in. Lots of food. We're good!
#happynewyear to all my twitter pals...may you always have a soft spot to curl up in. Thanks for the tweets and theâ€¦ https://t.co/WrwlQ05Bx7
@cox_tom how short is short? <the best to you Mr Cox, keep on writing!>
@norman_alvin Mum was cross with me cos I jumped on her pillow after visiting my litterbox but I did wipe my paws on the bedspread first!
@Jake_Dudman_ what's Queen Victoria doing on #DoctorWho? Is this a #crossover to her show on #PBS? #justwondering #sillysausage
Holding off on #Wigilia menu till 26th, when my human bro & offspring arrive. Instead, it's a Quebec #rÃ©veillon at our house! #tourtiÃ¨re!
To all my furriends and to all: have a wonderful holiday and the very best for the new year. Keep tweeting! #tuxedocats #catsoftwitter
Lamb stew last night for dins...helped wash, errm, lick the plates clean. Wonder what's on the menu for Xmas Eve...
@travelswithcats I swear on a stack of cans of tuna it wasn't Ichabod. It was da evil zombie dog. <paws crossed behind back>
Dear @gustotv Thanks for a wonderful year of programming & interacting with fans, both human & feline! Merry Christmas your pal Milo
@sjayyr Mum agrees with you! Merry Christmas to you and Daisy, from me, my Mum and Dad!
@sjayyr Mum cried too, so I let her pet me & didn't struggle as she hugged me (& no nibbling her hands). #goodboy #tearsforpets
The Bear will be missed. Thank you, Mr Cox for sharing his story with us all. https://t.co/DXDRfSX1je
@gustotv Mum's still talking about @Thechefspencer Xmas special! She loved it and him! Watts (hehe) about a fishdin for us cats?! @sjayyr
Decoration Status Report: Tree: 0 Milo: 3 Mum says 2 more & #Santa isn't stopping at our home. See Mum: Sue says iâ€¦ https://t.co/uPyZO1dJBw
Supervising the tree decorating...Mum says only unbreakables until I prove I'm good, whatever that means #crashâ€¦ https://t.co/8PdHDIhHvo
OK, Mum won this round...but I have filed her objection for later reference. https://t.co/xhjR31oxgq
Cats can work out mathematically the exact place to sit that will cause most inconvenience. ~Pam Brown https://t.co/3sfoszsDKe
If there is one spot of sun spilling onto the floor, a cat will find it and soak it up. ~J.A. McIntosh https://t.co/byzVZFhIe8
@sjayyr prowwwwrrrr! Hello Miss Daisy!!
@AllBlacks my team!! Wearing your colours! https://t.co/oPZi03oLxB
Happy Thanksgiving to my American furiends!
@sjayyr Mum asked me to remind you @NigelSlater's Xmas specials are on @gustotv on Sunday. We'll be watching!
@CuriousZelda Your whiskers are white And your teethies are too Bet thereâ€™s some human fingers You love to nibble â€˜n chew?
Someone said it's #tuxedocatappreciationday today? Well, APPRECIATE ME THEN!! TUNA SAMMIES FOR EVERYONE!!
Rain...rain...rain...bloody rain.
@TheCatHeSay more sad than offended. Personally, I'm rather fond of mice, especially with a dollop of sour cream on the side :)
YAY! and yes, thanks #Australia !! My team...my uniform! https://t.co/J6AxQ95yFm
@gustotv @Thechefspencer there's something fishy about Chef Spencer!
@gustotv I'm waiting for the app that reminds my humans to feed me based on my eating habits, not theirs!
@MoggysWhiskers got a distant cousin in Old Trafford who knows a good lawyer!
@myleftfang I feel your hunger pains too. I was starved 6 times today.
@sjayyr mum just discovered figs! She made awesome fig jam last week...with just a smidge of Grand Marnier. Too gritty for me, tho.
I have this urge to bake...must be 'cos Mum just watched an episode of #GBBO
My mum and I are supporting this campaign...for my dad. https://t.co/xDqmyTxENY
My mum and I just backed Canadaâ€™s best chefs back supportive cancer care on @Kickstarter https://t.co/CPDJCe44ym Please pledge :)
@gustotv too bad proofing an article isn't as easy as baking a cake! Even...even... even. Tsk tsk!
Today's #Google, #JeanBatten & #Buddy, her #blackcat, who flew with her. #BlackCatsRule #NZpride https://t.co/VkhBj3CzvO
Woo hoo, I love salmon! I wonder if they'll let me in? @fablekitchen - one of mum's fave restaurants. https://t.co/GMlUe1rOpw
@myleftfang you look nothing like a roo...more like a wallaby - cuter and more delicate ankles! :)
@dongenova That's a mighty fine spicy plum jam! <licking my whiskers> Mum asked me to thank you...and could you spare the recipe?
@gustotv two paws up for the Tuscan chicken skillet! I believe #SheWhoThinksShesMyBoss is planning that tonight!
@gustotv is this the 2nd season premiere? if so, mee-ow!! hey @sjayyr, Mum likes this show...he's funny too...and he does a mean fish dish!
@TheFuckingCat I plan on moving the furniture overnight so the humans think they've moved again when they wake up in the morning.
Yesterday it was too hot to move, my fur was sticking to everything...today, I need a blankie! https://t.co/NKzu7Webin
@plutoniumpage @TheFuckingCat and I can hum a few bars.
@TheFuckingCat D'you mind shifting till the following week? Social calendar booked for the next 10 days. I'll bring the miceballs.
@Elverojaguar @travelswithcats @vine new Olympic event?
@MoggysWhiskers @SciencePorn I bet Heston Blumenthal could figure out a way to fillet it!
@CleoandMilo1 rest easy, little buddy...you're home safe and sound :) the clan will take care of you.
@CBCOlympics that's Chile in lane 3...not China, you muppets
@WillandSteve You just won my mum's heart!
@CoCoChaneltheC1 I was expecting a bookcase or two that I could climb on :(
@carlyrosanna83 @ItsMeDeaner I'm rather partial to their dilled herring! :)
@ItsMeDeaner why, thank you!
The humans went to #Ikea and all I got was this lousy pillow. #sadcat #shatteredexpectations https://t.co/C3jZkKxWMb
I am in the doghouse...tripped up Mum. She has a broken 4th toe. Any ideas how I can make it up to her?
August...only 1 more month of repeats & hopefully a new season of shows announced. Feed me @gustotv, feed me! @sjayyr #gustotvfansunite
Totally buggered! 3 loads of laundry today, didn't even have the energy to finish folding the towels! #goodboy https://t.co/XH7mZOjmFs
@gustotv @sjayyr package arrived for Mum...I just checked to see it was safe to open! https://t.co/4kd7gxHwGA
@gustotv @sjayyr not a nut fancier myself, but looking forward to sampling everything else...Mum ordered a box!
@MYSADCAT Your photo made my Mum cry <sigh> now I have to cheer her up. Would a dead bird be appropriate for such an occasion?
@gustotv wait till Mum finds out she's missed this program! Pssst...don't tell her! I've PVR'd it!
@catladyland I'm partial to used toilet rolls :) have to be fast to get them from the wastepaper bin 'cos Dad's thorough with garbage duty
@walterbigcat I can definitely see the resemblance!
@yoko_kat @hugo4de My mum calls my left paw her "Harry Potter" paw! https://t.co/VvfedAoXpn
Trying to count sheep but the damn papparazzi... https://t.co/dFEOhKSB5H
@gustotv and a happy #CanadaDay from your fans - including your biggest kitty fan! https://t.co/Wm5HJYtVYQ
@ElDiabloZoe @RosieRoseLA @artymeeps @CuriousZelda @HazelCane Hum this: it works! Teeth 'n toes. What goes together? My teeth 'n your toes!
@myleftfang a wee in a manger...no crib for a poo...the little sweet Ollie doesn't know what to do....
@gustotv yay! looking forward to it! https://t.co/e3dgjddLCy
@sjayyr Sue! you're back! missed our chats! You didn't miss anything on #GustoTV - all repeats!
Mum stepped on my tail last night. OK, so I was in the kitchen while she was prepping dinner but, #guilt took over, I got an extra feed!
